MUT.F.summary: Mineralbrunnen Ãberkingen-Teinach GmbH & Co. KGaA produces and sells soft drinks in Germany. The company also offers mineral and medicinal water, and fruit juices. It provides mineral water under the Kisslegger, Krumbach, Teinacher, and Hirschquelle brands; soft and sweet drinks under the afri, Bluna, Teinacher Limo, Teinacher pleasure lemonade, Krumbach lemonades, Klindworth fruit lemonade brands; and fruit juices and variants under the Niehoffs Vaihinger, Klindworth, Lindavia, and Merziger brands. The company was formerly known as Mineralbrunnen Ãberkingen-Teinach Aktiengesellschaft and changed its name to Mineralbrunnen Ãberkingen-Teinach GmbH & Co. KGaA in February 2016. Mineralbrunnen Ãberkingen-Teinach GmbH & Co. KGaA was founded in 1923 and is headquartered in Bad Teinach-Zavelstein, Germany.

SLB.MU.summary: Staatl. Mineralbrunnen AG produces and distributes mineral water and soft drinks in Germany. It offers medicinal water, spritzers, and gourmets. The company also sells its products online. Staatl. Mineralbrunnen AG was founded in 1747 and is based in Bad BrÃ¼ckenau, Germany.
